nodes.text: Mittoblade was a location in the galaxy that was known for its razor cliffs. It was mentioned in a marching chant sung by Imperial cadets at the Academy for Young Imperials on Lothal. The Mittoblade Hall of Remembrance, a war museum, was located there.

Mittoblade was first mentioned in canon in the junior novel Servants of the Empire: Imperial Justice. In Legends, Mittoblade was an astronomical object in the Inner Rim, first mentioned in the online Author's Cut of The Essential Guide to Warfare.
